archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0728
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer when I am going about my day, I want to be able to manage my alerts/notifications, so that I get the specific information I need to mange my business

properties.value: OOTB for each notfication rule we may use parameters of customer or contact person or employee to deteminate if given notification should be send or not

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
